name: Duck Hunter
description:
This is my first solo video game project. It is a small game that was made using the Bitsy Game Maker.

In this game, you are the dog of a hunter, sent to hunt ducks so you both have something to eat when nightfall comes. You have to explore the area, hunting down ducks for food. You can also collect bones scattered around the area along the way, a dog has it's own wants after all.
